section.title: Define additional attributes for your custom Views
section.para: You can define additional attributes for your compound or custom views. To define additional attributes create an attrs.xml file in your res/values folder. The following shows an example of attributes defined for a new view called ColorOptionsView .

To use these attributes in your layout file you have to declare them in the XML header. In the following listing this is done via the xmlns:custom part of the code. These attributes are also assigned to the view.
The following example shows how you components can access these attributes.
